item.title: Isnâ€™t it ironic?
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Now I've bit my tongue on writing about the whole Schiavo controversy, and I know this is going to sound horrible.... But isn't it ironic that a woman who supposedly is starving to "death" (in my honest opinion she's been dead for several years now so the word "death" is in the loosest sense of the word) put herself into this mess by "making herself throw up after meals" (USAToday article)? How come this isn't more prominently mentioned in the THOUSANDS of news reports/opinions/ramblings we've had to put up with these last couple of months? Or maybe it has and I've chosen to tune it all out.
